item.title: 12 basic tips for R Code in production
item.description: h3 { margin-left: -24px; } Disclaimer : No need to follow all the rules, tips and tricks you read. You are still the best judge when it comes to writing code. Context is a huge factor and you should not rely on any particular advice. Start by writing something that works. It does not need to be perfect. 1. Microbench for performance critical code. Every decision is a trade off in production.
